titleInfo.title: Staggered fermion actions with improved rotational invariance

mods.abstract: We introduce a class of improved actions for staggered fermions which to O(p(4)) and O(p(6)), respectively, lead to rotationally invariant propagators. We discuss the resulting reduction of flavour symmetry breaking in the meson spectrum and comment on the improvement in the calculation of thermodynamic observables.

bibliographicCitation.ama: Peikert A, Beinlich B, Bicker A, Karsch F, Laermann E. Staggered fermion actions with improved rotational invariance. In: NUCLEAR PHYSICS B-PROCEEDINGS SUPPLEMENTS. Vol 63. ELSEVIER SCIENCE BV; 1998: 895-897.
